description: Parks Canada (PC) requires a third party consultant to research soil and farmland quality along with local agri-economic and agri-touristic factors and develop per acre fair market rental rate(s) for agricultural field leases in Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP). Parks Canada expects that the consultant will familiarize themselves with all aspects of RNUP’s mandate, including supporting a vibrant farming community, protecting natural and cultural heritage, and providing Canadians and international visitors with high quality visitor experience opportunities.Once completed and accepted by Parks Canada, the consultant’s report will be an important consideration within the leasing strategy for the park. The report may be be used to explain, set and justify rents (on a per acre basis) for new and existing farmers across the portfolio of agricultural lands that Parks Canada administers in RNUP.

### Tender Notice: Agricultural Lands Lease Rate Study
===============

#### Solicitation Number
---------------

* Invitation of Interest: PW-22-01012807
* Amendment Number: 2
* Solicitation Number: 2022COE002R2

#### Notice Details
----------------

* Date of Publication: November 8, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: December 13, 2022 at 16:00:00

#### Notice Type
----------------

* Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Procurement Information
-------------------------

* Competitive Bidding Process
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applicable

#### Project Overview
----------------

Parks Canada invites proponents to submit proposals to conduct a research study to determine fair market rental rates for agricultural field leases in Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP).

Leveraging expertise in agricultural economics, soil quality, and agri-touristic factors, the consultant will develop per-acre rental rates for agricultural land in RNUP. The study will inform Parks Canada's leasing strategy, enabling the agency to manage agricultural land in the national park efficiently.

Proponents must:

1. Familiarize themselves with RNUP's mandate and policies
2. Conduct market research and analysis on soil quality, agri-economic conditions, and agri-touristic factors
3. Prepare a comprehensive report detailing per-acre rental rates for agricultural fields

The selected consultant will work closely with Parks Canada to ensure the report addresses the agency's requirements and needs.

#### Documents
-------------

Refer to the attached documents on the [CanadaBuys platform](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/#/):

* Agricultural Lands Map
* Soil Types Map
* Agricultural Lands Lease Rate Study
* Q&A Session Agricultural Lands Lease Rate Study

#### Contact Information
----------------------

For inquiries and questions contact:

* Laird Munro, Consultant
* Email: [laird.munro@pc.gc.ca](mailto:laird.munro@pc.gc.ca)
* Phone: 403-605-9739

Please submit your proposal before the tender closing date. Parks Canada will not be responsible for communication delays during the submission process.

Bidder feedback will be requested as per the standard [request for information (RFI)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/pages/request-for-information-rfi.html) process.
